snippet: Political tensions drove the two Koreas to sever their last economic ties, which had been through the Kaesong Industrial Complex.
abstract: Remaining 43 South Korean factory managers in Kaesong Industrial Complex in North Korea return home as political tensions drive nations to sever their last economic ties.
lead_paragraph: Political tensions drove the two Koreas to sever their last economic ties, which had been through the Kaesong Industrial Complex.

headline.seo: Remaining South Korean Managers Leave Plant in North
headline.main: South Korea Pulls Bosses From Plants in North
headline.print_headline: South Korea Pulls Bosses From Plants In North
